  <p>Hello! I'm a data enthusiast with a passion for analyzing and visualizing information to uncover meaningful insights. My background spans across data science, statistics, and research methodologies.</p></p>
  </div>

<p>On this website, I share various data projects I've worked on, focusing particularly on:</p>
  <ul>
    <li>Data replications of interesting studies and articles</li>
    <li>Visualizations that help tell stories through data</li>
    <li>Analysis of topics related to economics, healthcare, and social sciences</li>
  </ul>
  
  <h3>My Approach</h3>
  
  <p>I believe in transparent, reproducible data analysis. When working on projects, I strive to:</p>
  
  <ul>
    <li>Clearly document my methodology and thought process</li>
    <li>Share code and data sources when possible</li>
    <li>Present findings in accessible, visually appealing formats</li>
    <li>Acknowledge limitations and potential biases in my analysis</li>
  </ul>
  
  <h3>Connect With Me</h3>
    
  <p>I'm always interested in connecting with fellow data enthusiasts, researchers, and curious minds. Feel free to reach out through <a href="https://github.com/kkardousk">GitHub</a> or connect with me on other platforms.</p>
